DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : COMPANY TOWN ANNEX
DOC.TEXT: Lynn Redgrave Files for Bankruptcy Protection : The actress , whose credits include the television_show " House Calls " and the 1960s film " Georgy Girl , " filed for protection from creditors under Chapter 11 of the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.Redgrave ' s financial problems stem from costly legal battles that started with her dispute with MCA ' s television unit over her 1981 dismissal , as well as disputes with her former lawyers in the now-defunct Finley , Kumble law_firm . Redgrave ' s bankruptcy lawyer , David Neale with Levene & Eisenberg , estimated that Redgrave will list about $ 250 # 000 in liabilities on her petition , the bulk of which she disputes . Her assets largely consist_of her Los Angeles-area home .
